site.name: Membangun Tata Kelola Air dan Sanitasi - Visual Interaktif Kompas
site.description: Tirta dan Emiliana. Membangun tata kelola air dan sanitasi untuk semua. Banyak wilayah Indonesia mengalami krisis air. Ternyata, masalahnya tak selalu soal air tak ada, tetapi tata kelolanya. Pengalaman Wahana Visi Indonesia memberi gambaran upaya penyelesaiannya.
site.keywords: vik, visual, interaktif, kompas, berita, longform, berita mendalam. laporan mendalam

site_en.name: Water Sanitation for All - Visual Interaktif Kompas
site_en.description: Tirta and Emiliana. Building inclusive water and sanitation system for all. Water crisis isn't just about scarcity. It's about governance. Here is how Wahana Visi Indonesia is solving it.
site_en.keywords: vik, visual, interaktif, kompas, berita, longform, berita mendalam. laporan mendalam
